name: MaFl_Kurumin
oralText: Hello there, traveler! This area, the plain of Bubble, was created by Bubble himself, long ago.
introText: The earth trembled as the battle between Shade and the Heroes was fought viciously. Scars from the battle can seen all over madrigal.

links.title: Who are you?
texts: Welcome, my name is Kurmin Hersan and I watch over the Plain of Bubble. It's an amazing area filled with life. It is a powerful place that seems to fill your soul with love and euphoria.
